#summary Release Notes
== Release 3.1.1.283  (Jan 24 2013) ==
  * Issue 61 - Enhancement: Better error messages for expression to expression handler mismatch
  * Issue 62 - Enhancement: Better error messages including line number and position for parsing errors
== Release 3.1.1.279  (Jun 9 2011) ==
  * Issue 58 - Bug: Nullable doubles and floats do not serialize correctly in non-english locales
  * Issue 57 - Bug: Decimal types do not serialize correctly in non-english locales
== Release 3.1.0.269  (May 8 2010) ==
  * Issue 55 - Bug: Having multiple complex nodes (IgnoredProperties,TypeConverters,etc) was causing an exception
== Release 3.1.0.267  (Apr 15 2010) ==
  * Issue 23 - Enhancement: Option to omit properties that have the default value
  * Issue 36 - Bug: Properties with private setters are not defaulted to Ignored
  * Issue 38 - Bug: ExpressionHandlersCollection doesn't honor IContextAware when setting default or null handler properties
  * Issue 39 - Enhancement: Usability enhancements to ExpressionHandlersCollection
  * Issue 40 - Enhancement: Properties where the actual property type is System.Type are handled now
  * Issue 41 - Enhancement: Multiple instances of the same System.Type no longer written as references
  * Issue 42 - Enhancement: Attribute service.  Custom actions can be applied by decorating properties/classes with attributes.
  * Issue 44 - Bug: Property converters not used when placed on a constructor parameter
  * Issue 49 - Enhancement: Property names in the json text can be customized using a strategy.
  * Issue 50 - Enhancement: You can now deserialize into an existing object
  * Issue 51 - Bug: Fixed issue when aliasing an open generic type
  * Issue 52 - Bug: Fixed issue where the type info was ignored when using the new operator in the Json text
  * Issue 54 - Enhancement: Extra properties within the json text that don't exist on the object can now be ignored. See MissingProperties.
== Release 3.0  (Jan 25 2009) ==
  * Issue 24 - Bug: Something wrong in DictionaryToListConverter
  * Issue 25 - Enhancement: Better Support for constructor-less classes
  * Issue 28 - Enhancement: Make GetTypeBinding and GetTypeAlias virtual
  * Issue 29 - Enhancement: Reference syntax now uses a subset of [http://goessner.net/articles/JsonPath/ JsonPATH]. e.g. $['foo']['bar'] 
  * Issue 30 - Enhancement: Rewrote much of the internals to allow for more customization
  * Issue 32 - Bug: Nullable values serialized with casting prefix unnecessarily
  * Issue 33 - Bug: Serializing dates depends on current culture
  * Issue 34 - Bug: Cast prefix on references
  * Issue 35 - Enhancement: Metadata for properties is now shared between base class and child classes, mimicking how reflection works
  * Issue 37 - Bug: Deserialisation of Double is CultureSpecific
  * Assembly is now strongly-named
  * Renamed classes and restructured framework-level code for better clarity and separation

== Release 2.1.1  (Jul 19 2008) ==
  * Issue 16 - Enhancement: Allow you to insert CollectionHandlers before the end of the list
  * Issue 18 - Bug: Boolean properties serialized with Proper Case (True/False)
  * Fixed some internal issues around finding ignored properties

== Release 2.1   (Jul 02 2008) ==
  * Issue 14 - Bug: Wrong constructor used in certain circumstances
  * Issue 15 - Bug: Validation prevented serializing a property with no setter


== Release 2.0   (Feb 15 2008) ==
  * Major performance improvements
  * Support for constructor arguments
  * Support for public fields
  * Added Configuration via config file

== Release 1.0   (Aug 08 2007) ==
  * Initial Release
